reviewText: We love Peppa Pig! This has proven a wonderful collection of episodes for longer drives in the family car. Perfect for toddler son.
My three year old daughter wants peppa on all of the time!! It's an adorable cartoon and one that I can actually tolerate :) my daughter's favorite outdoor activity is jumping in muddy puddles!!

My 21 month old twin boys love Peppa Pig. It keeps their attention for the entire time I play it for them. There are 14 episodes in total with a running time of 80 min. Absolutely a favorite of my boys.

This is the perfect show for little ones!  My 2 year old daughter LOVES Peppa & her family. It's one of the only shows that keeps her attention for long spans.  They are a happy, adventurous piggy family, which always makes her smile!  It's my favorite animated show as well!  :)

I don't know what it is but my daughter loves Peppa Pig.  Maybe its cute accent or the bright colors of the show but she gets excited when Peppa is on.  This new DVD is great because it contains 14 episodes, yes 14, so we can watch Peppa whenever and wherever we want.  The show is wholesome and has simple lessons for kids, perfect for young kids to grasp.

DVD Episodes:

My Birthday Party
The Playground
Fancy Dress Party
Ballet Lesson
Dens
Grandpa Pigs Boat
Daddy Puts Up a Picture
School Play
Rebecca Rabbit
Tidying Up
Grandpas Little Train
At the Beach
Frogs, Worms and Butterflies
Cleaning the Car

Anyway toddlers seem to love this show, and mine is one of them. This might be a British thing, but the dvd wouldn't play properly, in that the volume couldn't be adjusted, and the disc crashed my flat screen TV.  I have heard that those dvd's manufactured elsewhere than  in the US have similar problems.  The subject matter is excellent; this was simply a tech difficulty.

FIVE STARS for the DVDs of Peppa Pig, her family & friends.  Every story is short (+- 5 minutes),  which enables my 17 mo. old grandson to focus on each episode. He is absolutely mesmerized by most of the episodes (the story of the butterfly, worm & frog is his favorite). The stories are sweet, fun, & show the innocence of little ones (the way cartoons USED to be).  The closeness & caring of Peppa's family is wonderful to see, as is her relationships with her friends. If you want the young child in your life to see happy, funny, innocent cartoons, there are none better than Peppa Pig!  There is no violence or meanness in any episode!  I have purchased 4 Peppa Pig DVDs for my grandson, & have additional DVDs on his Wish List.

This is a great series for kids, especially if you play it on a car's DVD player. Each episode is only a few minutes long (5-10 minutes) so its better than playing a whole movie for short trips. My young kids (age 4 & 6) get very upset if the DVD player doesn't pick up at the point they left off when they get out of the car. But with this series, they can just watch the next episode. The humor in it is pretty funny for the parents too, especially if you have to listen to it dozens of times in the car.

Watch almost daily for over a month & still look for that special time- me too!!

My girls are both ostensibly beyond the age-range for Peppa and her family, but them so I am. This doesn't matter. Peppa Pig is so charming, so delightful warm and breezy that it is hard for me to imagine much of anybody at any age not being won over after a couple of episodes. The secret, to me, is that gentle and friendly as they are, they are completely devoid of mawkishness and sugary sentiment.

The humor is often sly, though never of the this-is-for-the-grown-ups-and-the-kids-won't-get-it variety. If you spend any time around little kids, you know good and well that there is a lot of overlapping sense of humor and Peppa does a nice job of this while never coming within miles of snark, sarcasm or mean spirit. Peppa and her family are, quite simply, wonderful.
